DOC.brief_summary: The study hypothesis: Valsartan as an angiotensin II receptor blocker treatment has beneficial effects on both midwall mechanics and myocardial functions in hypertensive patients with Left ventricular hypertrophy.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Valsartan on Left Ventricular Myocardial Functions in Hypertensive Patients With Left Ventricular Hypertrophy
